DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if cervical ultrasound exploration can predict difficult intubation better than main validated clinical criteria.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Interest on Cervical Ultrasound Exploration for Association With Difficult Intubation
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to determine if cervical ultrasound exploration can predict difficult intubation better than main validated clinical criteria in general surgery.
DOC.criteria: Age over 18 patient consent patient nonconsent age under 18 cervical surgery
